pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves (except for pilots); Shoes plus socks.

Active_Ingredients.name: Diglycolamine salt of 3,6-dichloro-o-anisic acid
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: affecting cell wall plasticity and nucleic acid metabolism

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Harmful if swallowed or absorbed through skin. Avoid contact with skin, eyes or clothing.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes; remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes then continue rinsing; call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice; have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow; do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor; do not give anything to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing; rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes; call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 24 fl oz per acre per year
24 fl oz per acre per year
